casebody.data:
Johnny S. PEREZ, Appellant,
v.
BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY, Respondent. WD 81474 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: January 15, 2019
Application for Transfer to Supreme Court Denied February 26, 2019
Application for Transfer Denied April 30, 2019 Daniel J. Cohen, St. Louis, MO, Attorney for Appellant. Craig M. Leff and Brian M. Bartlett, Kansas City, MO, Attorneys for Respondent. Before Division Two: Alok Ahuja, Presiding Judge, and Thomas H. Newton and Mark D. Pfeiffer, Judges

Order

Per Curiam:

Mr. Johnny S. Perez appeals from the judgment of the Circuit Court of Clay County, Missouri, entered following a jury verdict in favor of BNSF Railway Company on Mr. Perez's Federal Employees Liability Act claim for work-related personal injuries. Because a published opinion would have no precedential value, a memorandum of law has been provided to the parties. The judgment is affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
